subject: Procurement of ex-servicemen for fee collection from the office of Directorate General of Resettlement (DGR)
text: Hrr 7cf <TTHT gfeazut Tht Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (3v 4artt 3< TrTn TTr) WH / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India WA. Extn = 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #-5 V 8, #e-10, ETrTT; 7 faorh} 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/22/07-08 /CMD-CO/DGR (Vol. VIII) 23rl Septernber 2009 CIRCULAR NQ:NHAILCOMMERCIAL QPERATIONS 106 This circular is issued in supercession of circular no/ 96 dated 23.5.2008 and in continuation to our circular no_ 88 dated 15.6.2007. The only amendment made is at Sr. No. 4 & 5 of the evaluation criteria sheet where the 10 marks for local language has been bifurcated between knowledge of local language and bona-fide resident (based on domical certificate) of the concerned State. A standardized assessment sheet to judge the   suitability of the ex-= servicemen   during interview is enclosed,. AlL   PDs / PIUs are requested to strictly  follow the criteria as per assessment sheet during the selection process, to ensure uniformity, transparency and recording of the assessment by the committee. While   issuing  interview letters, sponsored ex- servicemen must be asked to bring the following documents in original and attested/notarised photocopy to verily and form the basis for marking along with financial hids: 1 _ Retired Officer's Identily Card 2. Pension order (PPO) 3. Retirement Medical Certilicate 4 DGR Registration Certilicale 5. University Degree 6, Certificale in support of computer knowledge 7. 1Oth class certificate of the Board in support of local language knowledge 8 Detail of Present establishment and prool of manpowcr (last audited balance sheet etc ) 9_ Scroll oi Gallantry / Presidential Award, This issues with approval el Competent Authority and is to come into force with immediate effect, ~Oxg _ 64 - Rajesh General Manager {Tech. & CO) To All PIU's/ CMU'3 to: 1_ All Members / CGMs/ CVO 2.
